mapper.select: select r.replyId, r.reviewId, r.uid, r.replyContent, r.repliedDate, r.isRevised, r.revisedDate, r.isDeleted, r.deletedDate, u.nickname, u.address from replyTbl r left outer join userTbl u on r.uid = u.uid where reviewId = #{reviewId} and r.isDeleted = 0 order by repliedDate;
mapper.insert: insert into replyTbl(reviewId, uid, replyContent) values (#{reviewId}, #{uid}, #{replyContent})
